Module com.example.cs230
Package CS230.saveload

Class PlayerProfile

java.lang.Object
CS230.saveload.PlayerProfile
public class PlayerProfile extends Object
Class that reads the current Player's status from saved files and handle player input to move or make changes
Version:
1.0
Author:
Caleb Ocansey, Alex-Carmen Macoveanu, Marek Jezinski
